notes: feat: Element props now can be localized. 111
fix: Some random stuff
fix: List object group child remove fix.
fix: Display label in validation message when the label is specified as a function.
fix: Localize generic name for validation messages.
fix: Floating label position CSS fix.
feat: Element props now can be localized.
feat: Added `rel="nofollow noopener"` to image previews.
feat: Added `closeOnDeselect` options for selects.
feat: Added `locale` options for Vueform to override locale for a single form.
fix: Switching locale in global `$vueform` object will now have immediate effect without having to use `:key` on components.
fix: Minor CSS fix in `SelectElement` and `MultiselectElement` floating label in `tailwind` theme.
feat: Columns with label < 12 no longer need `horizontal` class - it is now automatic.
feat: Added `keydown`, `keyup` and `keypress` events for text and textarea elements.
fix: `SelectElement` and `MultiselectElement` selected item label padding fix in `tailwind` theme.
feat: OR type conditions.
feat: New condition operators: `empty`, `not_empty`, `today`, `before`, `after`, `^`, `$`, `*`.
fix: Incorrectly displaying disabled `aria` for static element.
fix: UI fix for list remove buttons.
fix: UI fix for select, multiselect & tags elements.
fix: Adding element after resorting a list / multifile should add as last.
fix: Change radiogroup / checkbox group tabs with arrows.
feat: Tree now include tabs/steps with correct element order.
fix: Multifile data & requestData fixes.
fix: Got into infinite loop in production if custom element level error messages were defined as inline objects.
fix: Don't disable the Next button on a valid step.

feat: Z-index optimization thought the whole library. New rule is that everything has z-index 999 that intended to be brought to top (eg. tooltip, dropdown) and everything else got the lowest possible (1) z-index where relative z-indexing was needed.
feat: Added `clearMessage` method to clear all messages manually added to `messageBag`.
feat: Refactored tabs & steps CSS.
feat: Form steps are now using `v-if` instead of `v-show`.
feat: Added `isLast`, `isFirst`, `last$` props steps & tabs.
feat: Finish step now also recognizes `next` label (for ease of configuration).
feat: Focus first element on next step if stepped with keyboard.
feat: A11y improvements.
fix: Multifile object gallery rendered images in rows.
fix: Remove query param from uploaded filename.
fix: Pressing enter in certain elements caused removing or adding list elements.
fix: Datepicker was aligned to right in `tailwind` theme.
feat: Added current Vueform version to `$vueform.version`.
feat: Added `rules` & related options to `GroupElement` & `ObjectElement`.
feat: Added `reinitValidation()` method to elements.
feat: Added `tree` & `flatTree` props to `Vueform`.
fix: Submit steps on Finish in FFX broke in some versions.
fix: List first instance didn't display instantly when a prototype got defined on the flight if list was in a group.
fix: Aria didn't display for certain elements eg. Group, Object.
fix: Element's container class is now added to inline layout's container.
fix: Multifile resort images in stage 2 refresh fix.
fix: Axios now works with an instance provided to config.
fix: Refresh order fields in object lists when `storeOrder` changes or reseted.
fix: Reset list children when directly resetting lists.
feat: Added `tree` and `flatTree` props to `Vueform` component.
feat: A11y improvements.
feat: Added `updateColumns` API method.
feat: Multifile inherits file props.
feat: Errors and messages can now display HTML.
fix: Removed unused import from `tailwind.js`.
fix: Added datepicker locales.
fix: Mobile datepicker fix.
fix: Removed `font-sans` from select elements' search input in Tailwind.
fix: Tailwind 3 lg input floating label positioning fix.
fix: `GroupElement` can now be placed in an `ObjectElement`.
feat: Allow `false` value for `FileElement`'s `url` option.
feat: If a filename contains url only the filename is displayed.
feat: Can pass an axios instance to `axios` option in `vueform.config.js`.
fix: Select endpoint will add search param with `&` if it already contains `?`.
fix: Added `regeneratorRuntime` to `validator` export.
fix: API Key validation url fixed.
fix: Nested global form element styles under `form` tag.
feat: Added [API Key](/docs/1.x/installation#api-key) validation.
feat: Removed Composition API dependency. Use Vue.js 2.7+ instead.
fix: Added `components` to element creator.
fix: Locales export `module.exports` -> `export default`.
fix: Fixed `clean()` for `Vueform` and `ListElement`.
fix: Added prefix to component styles.
